sentences.en: A small number of Marines were wounded.
sentences.cn: 几名海军陆战队士兵受了伤。

sentences.en: Bezanik is diving to collect marine organisms.
sentences.cn: 贝扎尼奇正在潜水采集海洋生物。

sentences.en: He was a soldier of Marine Corps.
sentences.cn: 他曾是海军陆战队里的一名士兵.

sentences.en: Marine construction technology like this is very complex, somewhat analogous to trying to build a bridge under water.
sentences.cn: 像这样的海底建造技术很复杂，与尝试在水下建桥有些相似。

sentences.en: Marine creatures are those which live in the sea.
sentences.cn: 海洋生物是生存在海里的生物.

sentences.en: Most marine gastropod mollusks develop a ciliate swimming organ  in certain larval stages.
sentences.cn: 大多数海洋腹足纲软体动物在某些幼体阶段形成一种有纤毛的游泳器官。

sentences.en: Plankton is at the bottom of the marine food chain.
sentences.cn: 浮游生物处于海洋食物链的最底层.

sentences.en: the effects of oil pollution on marine mammals
sentences.cn: 石油污染对海洋哺乳动物的影响

sentences.en: the enormous variety of marine life
The most effective new botanicals are extracts from cola nut and marine algae.
sentences.cn: 这种极其有效的新型植物制剂是从可乐果和海藻中提炼出来的。

sentences.en: The new marine law will be carried out.
The phosphate was deposited by the decay of marine microorganisms.
sentences.cn: 海洋微生物腐烂后沉积形成磷酸盐。

sentences.en: the richness and variety of marine life
The sinking of the tanker has made aspects of marine pollution particularly topical.
sentences.cn: 油轮的沉没使得海洋污染的方方面面都成为眼下大家尤为关注的热点话题。

sentences.en: There are lots of marine mammals such as whales and seals in the sea.
sentences.cn: 海洋里有许多诸如鲸鱼和海豹类的海生哺乳动物.

sentences.en: Two small Marine units have been trapped inside the city for the last 36 hours.
sentences.cn: 两支海军小分队在过去的36个小时被困在城内。

sentences.en: When spilled into the sea, oil can be toxic to marine plants and animals.
sentences.cn: 石油溢入海洋可能危害海洋生物.

phrases.tran_cn: 船用设备；水上设备；航海设备
n. 海洋经济产业，水产业

trans.tran_cn: 海洋的，海产的，海军的，海船的
trans.tran_en: relating to the sea and the creatures that live there
A marine is a member of an armed force, for example the U.S. Marine Corps or the Royal Marines, who is specially trained for military duties at sea as well as on land.
